short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of tools to make journalists' lives easier.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search competitors' sites with ease. Open social networks with new keyboard shortcuts. Get quick access to a dictionary and thesaurus without leaving the page you're on.
